image_requirements.description: DO iron or steam the clothing before photographing it.
DON'T stretch the garment on the model or mannequin. The garment should rest naturally.
DON'T have any items or hair obstructing the garment.
DO keep the garment a little bit scrunchy to mimic how it normally hangs.
The garment should not be too loose or droopy on sides, and no puckering anywhere.
DON'T tuck in the shirt or top unless styled that way.
When styling long sleeves or bottoms, roll up as necessary.
DO follow the rule to do the least amount of styling possible.
